mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.xunwuqishi_name as xunwuqishiName ,a.shiwuzhaoling_types as shiwuzhaolingTypes ,a.zhaohuizhuangtai_types as zhaohuizhuangtaiTypes ,a.xunwuqishi_photo as xunwuqishiPhoto ,a.xunwuqishi_time as xunwuqishiTime ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.xunwuqishi_dizhi as xunwuqishiDizhi ,a.xunwuqishi_content as xunwuqishiContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,yonghu.yonghu_uuid_number as yonghuUuidNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.jinyong_types as jinyongTypes
FROM xunwuqishi a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.xunwuqishi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xunwuqishiName},'%')
and a.shiwuzhaoling_types = #{params.shiwuzhaolingTypes}
and a.zhaohuizhuangtai_types = #{params.zhaohuizhuangtaiTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.xunwuqishi_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.xunwuqishiTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.xunwuqishi_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.xunwuqishiTimeEnd})
and a.xunwuqishi_time = #{params.xunwuqishiTime}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.xunwuqishi_dizhi like CONCAT('%',#{params.xunwuqishiDizhi},'%')
and a.xunwuqishi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.xunwuqishiContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuUuidNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.jinyong_types = #{params.jinyongTypes}
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
